==Components of a Test script==
You can manage your automation script in a stand alone project structure as most of the enterprise software solutions do. Typically your automation project structure looks like:
  * A Project file
  * A project configuration file
  * Application global file
  * One script folder
  * One Suite folder
  * One bin folder
